#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
main()
{
    int T,i;
    int N,C,temp;
    long sum=0;
    cin>>T;
    while(T--)
    {
        sum=0;
        cin>>N>>C;
        for(int i=0;i<N;++i)
        {
            cin>>temp;
            sum+=temp;
        }
        if(sum<=C)
        {
            cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
        }
        else
            cout<<"No"<<endl;

    }
}
